website_summaries.verdict: Though using this serum may result in longer, fuller lashes, there's also a chance of limited results or irritation.
pros: Combines amino acids and panthenol that protects lashes to aid in growth
Some noted that their lashes are longer and/or thicker after several weeks of regular use
Can also be used on brows
cons: Not all users had positive results, and some reported that it took months of use before noticing a difference

customer_reviews.title: Expired product and instead of fixing the issue
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this because people said they were expired and guess what happened! So instead of them ensuring that their product isn’t expired they decide to scratch off the date and cover it up with a sticker!
customer_reviews.author: irene zavala

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, the reviews are correct. This really does work, my lashes are noticeably longer after about a month. Not necessarily that much thicker, but quite a bit longer which I'm very pleased with. I tried using this on brows too - but it's much more convenient to buy the separate RapidBrow (which also works really well) since the wand is made especially for brows. Both are great.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Have bought before at other sources. Good price. Good buy. WORKS! As good, if not better than more expensive products. Saw results at 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Zillabreeze

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lash growth serum
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for yesrs with amazing results. You must use it every night before bed. You can use it on your brows too, but not if they are tattooed or it will strip the eyebrow tattoo pigment.
customer_reviews.author: Ljp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe my eyelashes just after one month using it
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I recently tried to save money by using different brands, never again! You'll notice results within 2 months. Other people will notice within 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: WhizBang

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This works!!! The one thing I will say is be careful I started feeling like an itchy eye and I think it was because I was putting too much on. Maybe use 3 times a week not everyday! Otherwise it’s amazing!! It works my lashes are awesome! I also put on my brows to make them grow. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Perez

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for one month now and I do not see any results. I have used other products before and would not recommend this one. I wanted to return it but the window was closed at this time. Keep looking
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best around!!
customer_reviews.text: The. Absolute. Best! I have spent a lot of money on this type of serum. This one is the best in my opinion. Does not irritate my eyes, feels like it moisturizers well it works during the evening... And my eyelashes are longer!
customer_reviews.author: Just me :)

customer_reviews.title: It does help enhancse growth of lashes and brow
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product many times I use it for my eyebrows and eyelashes. It does work!! Enhances the growth,on both lashes and brows . I am very pleased with the results!!
customer_reviews.author: Stormie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This actually works. I usually use R&F which is $150 . I had tried other serums which didn't work this worked almost as well as R&F. It takes 4 weeks for growth using once daily. Fast delivery. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Great product that really works
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have ordered several times. This serum has really made a difference in my lashes. My daughter ask if I was wearing false lashes. This serum has made my lashes much fuller and longer. My only complaint is I have ordered this numerous times and I have received two tubes that were empty. Not sure if the tubes we old, or what the problem was. If you order, check the contents early to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Another lash product works a lot better for thickening & lengthening for $150
customer_reviews.text: Works decent for the price point. U need to use it every evening. Another lash product works a lot better for thickening & lengthening for $150.00 vs this cost of Rapidlash. I will stick with this product unless another product comes out that is similar or better for a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Used it for about 2 years. I keep reordering as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Poodle lover

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's ok you need to be consistent with every night.
customer_reviews.author: Seal

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get it in your eyes.  It’s also good on eye brows
customer_reviews.text: I like the product because it works. I don’t like the price...but as far as lash re-growth goes, it’s competative
customer_reviews.author: Celia Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for shipping so quickly. I love rapid lash and have used it on and off for 7 years. I recently had eyelash extensions removed leaving me with short, thin and missing eyelashes. After using Rapidlash for only one week, my lashes are growing back and becoming longer and thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: i wouldn't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this products before from the pharmacy and it was very very nice and I felt the difference in my lashes from thired day. but with this one i ، I sow the difference in 1 month and it was not that much difference
customer_reviews.author: mariam

customer_reviews.title: Not the same Rapid Lash as store purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product in stores and had amazing results. This one that I bought on Amazon, I might as well be putting water on my lashes. I can’t even tell there is anything much on the applicator. I will not order this on Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Dowd

customer_reviews.title: ... using this product for a number of years and love it. It doesn't thicken lashes but makes them ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a number of years and love it. It doesn't thicken lashes but makes them darker and keeps them from falling out.
customer_reviews.author: carol a. asher

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I usually use Babe Lash - it's a lot more expensive so I've been looking for an alternative. This one just didn't work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: CNCs Mom

customer_reviews.title: Did not received eyebrow serum with the combo eyelash/eyebrow serum package.
customer_reviews.text: Only receive the eyelash serum even though i ordered both eyelash serum and eyebrow serum - twice. Returning it for the second time since i only received half the product I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: J. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: No growth for over a month
customer_reviews.text: No changes. Been using for over a month. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Will recommend this product to anyone!!! Can’t believe how well it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Meagaan T.

customer_reviews.title: Rapidlash eyelash growing serum
customer_reviews.text: This is the best one! Eye lash will growing for sure, easy to apply. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Until I started using Rapidlash, my eye lashes were very short and sparse. Now people have asked me if they are real!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely seeing results at about 1 month in. Even works on eyebrows
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: So far is doing well. I haven't been using it very long. I hope it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Lizabeth Rice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Great results rather quickly. I am very happy with Rapidlash
customer_reviews.author: susan joffrion

customer_reviews.title: You MUST try this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product started working within a few days! My lashes continue to grow longer! I highly recommend this product. It's much cheaper than Latisse, that's for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Rochele

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product was not in the box!! Very PO right now!! I should have checked when it got delivered!
customer_reviews.author: JUSTINE BADAMI

customer_reviews.title: Beware Eyelid Irritation
customer_reviews.text: Eyelids became red, swollen, and hideous. Had to return. Read a lot on these and they aren't safe for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. It doesn't
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this over a month every single night. Used on my top & bottom lashes and my eyebrows and have noticed zero hair growth. Very disappointed. It doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Smith

customer_reviews.title: I swear by this product and tell all my friends
customer_reviews.text: It really, really works. People think I have false lashes. And my eyebrows (which were almost invisible) have grown significantly, although I still have to use brow pencil. They're not thick and bushy, but at least the tails and the insides have grown back quite a bit, so that they're normal length. I got over-waxed by someone a long time ago, and they never grew back until now. But...you must use it every day. And if you stop, so will the effect. To be fair, that's the same as with Latisse. You have to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Blacet

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to everyone who wants longer lashes
customer_reviews.text: Makes eyelashes grow so long. But you must apply every night for 30 or 34 nights, but by then you will see that your lashes have grown very long. I recommend this to everyone who wants longer lashes. I will keep reordering Rapid Lash.
customer_reviews.author: Dovie

customer_reviews.title: I've only just begun to use it. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only just begun to use it. I have had success with it years ago, and then it stopped working for me. Someone told me the formula had been changed so I decided to try it again. I will write another review in a month. So far, I haven't had any issues with it. It's too soon to tell if it will actually work as it should. So I have now been using it for a couple weeks and it has caused my eyebrows and eyelashes to thicken up and grow more hairs. I think it's going to work even better as time goes on. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Carter

customer_reviews.title: It needs to be applied 2xs a day to continue ...
customer_reviews.text: It needs to be applied 2xs a day to continue to help the brow growth and staying the same growth. I don't know why I had to order the Lash one instead of the Brow one which I have used for over a year. I cannot use the Lash one on my lashes due to glaucoma and this being a steroid so to speak. But to have to order Lash and get a free paint brush-like applicator to apply to the brows is just ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lashes YES
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, been using it for a couple of years, found it after I heard Barbara Walters and Kathy Lee Gifford talk about it! It works!
customer_reviews.author: Christine A. Kube

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using this for two years now. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for two years now. I actually have eyelashes for the first time in my life. I used to have stubs
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L.K. M.

customer_reviews.title: I do like this product
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product, but I thought the brush included would be easy to use for eyebrows, but it won't fit in the opening of the container, so therefore is misleading to send along with this product.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Eh...It’s fine.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m fine with the results. I do think my lashes have gotten longer - didn’t do before/after pics - but they’ve certainly not gotten any fuller. For the money I’m satisfied. Just think I’ll try a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me. Tried it for months.
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for my lashes. Used faithfully over 3 months. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have use this product for years on my eyebrows and lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: This product REALLY works!! And it ie a GREAT value for the $$$. So very easy to use, too!!
customer_reviews.author: wpn01

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It really works! But you must use it every night. I started to see results in 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci L. Yaeger

customer_reviews.title: Not happy about the mix
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the eyelash and eyebrow serum combined as shown in my order BUT I GOT just the eyelash serum. Not happy about the mix up
customer_reviews.author: Amina Dianalan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it's working- if so it's not noticiable
customer_reviews.author: LCOC

customer_reviews.title: It's useless. I went through one and didn't do anything ...
customer_reviews.text: It's useless. I went through one and didn't do anything for my lashes. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Khanoom

customer_reviews.title: This stuff realy works!!
customer_reviews.text: My eyelashes really are longer than they were before I started using this product. I'm always skeptical about ads that say a product does this or that, but I found out this product really does make your eyelashes grow!
customer_reviews.author: Adelle J. Carson

product_meta.title: Rapidlash Eyelash Enhancing Serum, 0.1 Oz
product_meta.description: Adds shine & flexibility to hairs.Creates fuller, longer & healthier looking lashes in just weeks.Ideal for women & Men with brittle, weak, thin or short lashes & brows.To use: Apply a thin line of RapidLash to the base of the upper eyelash, lower lash line using the applicator brush. Use once daily at night before bedtime
feature_bullets: Contains advanced polypeptides, essential proteins, vitamins, hydrating & rejuvenating ingredients
Helps replenish & correct the appearance of lashes & brows

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
